languages.text: The wielder of this staff gains Syphon Life {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} at power level 13. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heroic Act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Desperate Measure{/g} versions. The power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing level of this power. In combat, the psyker wielding the staff suffers {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}. The bleeding damage every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} is equal to the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +2 psy rating
languages.original_text: На 13 уровне посоха становится доступна {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Вытягивание жизни. Также варианты этой способности доступны в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героического акта{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянных мер{/g}. Значения {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} и лечения от этой силы зависят от уровня посоха. Псайкер, использующий этот посох в бою, получает {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g}. В каждом {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g} урон от кровотечения равен {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтингу{/g} псайкера. +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +2 к пси-рейтингу

traits.locale_text: The wielder of this staff gains the Syphon Life ability at power level 8. The ability is also available in its Heroic Act and Desperate Measure versions. The power level affects the damage and healing level of this power. In combat, the psyker wielding the staff suffers bleeding. The bleeding damage every round is equal to the psyker's psy rating. +10 Willpower +2 psy rating

The wielder of this staff gains Syphon Life {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} at power level 13. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heroic Act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Desperate Measure{/g} versions. The power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing level of this power. In combat, the psyker wielding the staff suffers {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}. The bleeding damage every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} is equal to the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +2 psy rating

[Уже отредактировано Джоном] The wielder of this staff gets Syphon Life with 8 power level, and its Heroic Act and Desperate Measure versions. The power level affects the Damage and healing level of this power. In combat, the Psyker becomes Bleeding. The Bleeding Damage is equal to the Psy Rating every round. +10 Willpower +2 Psy Rating

The wielder of this staff gains Syphon Life {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} at power level 13. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heroic Act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Desperate Measure{/g} versions. The power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing level of this power. In combat, the psyker wielding the staff suffers {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}. The bleeding damage every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} is equal to the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +2 psy rating

The wielder of this staff gains Syphon Life {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} at power level 13. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heroic Act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Desperate Measure{/g} versions. The power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing level of this power. In combat, the psyker wielding the staff suffers {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}. The bleeding damage every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} is equal to the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +2 psy rating

languages.text: 这根法杖的使用者获得生命虹吸{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，力量等级为13。这个能力既可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}使用，也可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}使用。力量等级会影响此能力造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}与治疗的生命值。在战斗中使用这根法杖的灵能者会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}状态。每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}承受的流血伤害等同于灵能者的{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}。 +10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +2灵能等级
languages.original_text: The wielder of this staff gains Syphon Life {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} at power level 13. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heroic Act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Desperate Measure{/g} versions. The power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing level of this power. In combat, the psyker wielding the staff suffers {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}. The bleeding damage every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} is equal to the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +2 psy rating

traits.locale_text: 这根法杖的使用者获得生命虹吸{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，力量等级为8。这个能力既可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}使用，也可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}使用。力量等级会影响此能力造成的伤害与治疗的生命值。在战斗中使用这根法杖的灵能者会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}状态。每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}承受的流血伤害等同于灵能者的{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}。 +10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +2灵能等级

这根法杖的使用者获得生命虹吸{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，力量等级为13。这个能力既可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}使用，也可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}使用。力量等级会影响此能力造成的伤害与治疗的生命值。在战斗中使用这根法杖的灵能者会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}状态。每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}承受的流血伤害等同于灵能者的{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}。 +10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +2灵能等级

languages.text: この杖の使用者はパワーレベル13になると生命抽出{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を獲得する。このアビリティは{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}中および{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}においても利用可能である。パワーレベルはこのパワーの{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}および治癒レベルに影響を及ぼす。戦闘において、杖を使役する異能者は{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}ダメージを受ける。各{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}における出血ダメージは異能者の{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}に相当する。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が+10増加 超能力レートが+2増加
languages.original_text: The wielder of this staff gains Syphon Life {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} at power level 13. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heroic Act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Desperate Measure{/g} versions. The power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing level of this power. In combat, the psyker wielding the staff suffers {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}. The bleeding damage every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} is equal to the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +2 psy rating

traits.locale_text: この杖の使用者はパワーレベル8になると生命抽出{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を獲得する。このアビリティは{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}中および{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}においても利用可能である。パワーレベルはこのパワーのダメージおよび治癒レベルに影響を及ぼす。戦闘において、杖を使役する異能者は{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}ダメージを受ける。各{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}における出血ダメージは異能者の{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}に相当する。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が10増加 超能力レートが2増加

この杖の使用者はパワーレベル13になると生命抽出{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を獲得する。このアビリティは{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}中および{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}においても利用可能である。パワーレベルはこのパワーのダメージおよび治癒レベルに影響を及ぼす。戦闘において、杖を使役する異能者は{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}ダメージを受ける。各{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}における出血ダメージは異能者の{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}に相当する。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が10増加 超能力レートが2増加

languages.text: El portador de este báculo gana la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Drenaje de vida a nivel de poder 13. Esta capacidad también está disponible como {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medida desesperada{/g}. El nivel de poder afecta al {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y a la curación de este poder. En combate, el psíquico que tenga equipado el báculo sufre {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}. El daño de hemorragia de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} es igual al {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} del psíquico. +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} Factor psíquico +2

Также варианты этой способности доступны в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героического акта{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянных мер{/g}. Значения {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} и лечения от этой силы зависят от уровня посоха. Псайкер, использующий этот посох в бою, получает {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g}. languages.text: Der Träger dieses Stabs erhält die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Leben aussaugen auf Energiestufe 13. Die Fähigkeit ist auch in den Versionen {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstat{/g} verfügbar. Die Energiestufe wirkt sich auf den {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} und die Heilung dieser Kraft aus. Im Kampf erleidet der Psioniker, der den Stab führt, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}. Der Blutungsschaden in jeder {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} entspricht dem {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} des Psionikers. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} +2 Psi-Wert
languages.original_text: The wielder of this staff gains Syphon Life {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} at power level 13. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heroic Act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Desperate Measure{/g} versions. The power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing level of this power. In combat, the psyker wielding the staff suffers {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}. The bleeding damage every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} is equal to the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +2 psy rating

Der Träger dieses Stabs erhält die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Leben aussaugen auf Energiestufe 13. languages.text: L'utilisateur de ce bâton bénéficie de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Siphonage de force vitale au niveau de puissance 13. Des versions {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Acte héroïque{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Mesure désespérée{/g} de cette capacité sont également disponibles. Les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés et les soins prodigués dépendent du niveau de puissance. Au combat, le psyker qui a recours à ce bâton subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}. Le nombre de points de dégâts infligés à chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} par l'effet Saignement est égal à l'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} du psyker. +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} +2 d'indice psy
languages.original_text: The wielder of this staff gains Syphon Life {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} at power level 13. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heroic Act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Desperate Measure{/g} versions. The power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing level of this power. In combat, the psyker wielding the staff suffers {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}. The bleeding damage every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} is equal to the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +2 psy rating

traits.locale_text: L'utilisateur de ce bâton acquiert la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Siphonnage de Force Vitale au niveau de puissance 8. Les versions {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Acte Héroïque{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Mesure Désespérée{/g} de cette capacité sont également disponibles. Les dégâts infligés dépendent du niveau de puissance. Au combat, le psyker qui a recours à ce bâton subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}. Le nombre de points de dégâts infligés à chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} par l'effet Saignement est égal à l'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} du psyker. +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} +2 d'indice psy
